Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The game logic of Yahtzee, determining score and rolling.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
